Play Commands.name: play
Play Commands.description: Starts playing the first result of the query or link

Play Commands.name: playnow
Play Commands.description: Stops playing the current song and starts playing the first result of the query or link

Play Commands.name: playnext
Play Commands.description: Starts playing the first result of the query or link after the current song has finished

Play Commands.name: playshuffle
Play Commands.description: Plays the first result of the query or link in a random order

Music Player Commands.name: shuffle
Music Player Commands.description: Randomly shuffles the remaining songs in the queue

Music Player Commands.name: remove
Music Player Commands.description: Removes the song from the queue at [index], you can remove a range of songs by giving the index in the form #-#

Music Player Commands.name: volume
Music Player Commands.description: Sets the volume to [v]% (must be between 0% and 200%)

Music Player Commands.name: stop
Music Player Commands.description: Stops the currently playing song, clears the queue, and disconnects from voice

Music Player Commands.name: destroy
Music Player Commands.description: Stops and removes the music player

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud using the query and plays the first song

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc song
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud using the query and plays the first song

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc songs
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud using the query and plays the top songs that match the query

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc user
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud for a user and plays their most recent songs

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc playlist
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud for a playlist and queues songs from the first result

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc tagged
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud for songs with a given tag and plays the top songs with that tag

SoundCloud Commands.name: play sc genre
SoundCloud Commands.description: Searches SoundCloud for songs with a given genre and plays the top songs with that genre

Utility Commands.name: loop
Utility Commands.description: Sets the loop state for this session: 'off' will stop looping, 'on' will loop everything played this session when the queue finishes, 'shuffle' will shuffle before looping

Utility Commands.name: settopic
Utility Commands.description: Sets Modis to update this channel's topic with the currently playing song

Utility Commands.name: cleartopic
Utility Commands.description: Stops Modis from updating this channel's topic with the currently playing song

Utility Commands.name: nowplaying
Utility Commands.description: Gives information about the current song

Utility Commands.name: front
Utility Commands.description: Moves the music player to the front of the channel the command was sent from

Documentation: To see all commands, go to the Music Module Documentation at https://infraxion.github.io/modis/documentation/modules/music/
About: music plays videos and playlists from YouTube, and music files stored on the internet.
